sentences.sContent: The bright plumage of many male birds was thought to have evolved to attract females.
sentences.sCn: 许多雄鸟的鲜艳羽毛被认为是为吸引雌鸟而进化来的。

sentences.sContent: Birds are widely believed to have evolved from dinosaurs.
sentences.sCn: 鸟类普遍被认为是从恐龙进化而来的。

sentences.sContent: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
sentences.sCn: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.sContent: ...Your body didn't evolve to handle this kind of thing...
...I have watched the library where I work evolve into a career and business center...

synos.tran: 发展，进化；进化；使逐步形成；推断出
发展，进展；进化；逐步形成

remMethod.val: e(出) ＋ volve(转) → 转出来 → 使进化

trans.tranOther: When animals or plants evolve, they gradually change and develop into different forms
